tool_description: Github Data Scraper is the great way to get access to Github repositories details
name: Leo Github Data Scraper
title: Leo Github Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get top 30 of Github repos based on a query
api_list.description: Get top 30 of Github repos based on a query
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leo-github-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/rails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leo-github-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://leo-github-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leo-github-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
